descr: "Significant health events and conditions for a person related to the patient relevant in the context of care for the patient."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a FamilyMemberHistory resource"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "This records identifiers associated with this family member history record that are defined by business processes and/ or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation)."

fields.name: definition
fields.descr: "A protocol or questionnaire that was adhered to in whole or in part by this event."

fields.name: status
fields.descr: "A code specifying the status of the record of the family history of a specific family member."

fields.name: _status
fields.descr: "Extensions for status"

fields.name: notDone
fields.descr: "If true, indicates the taking of an individual family member's history did not occur. The notDone element should not be used to document negated conditions, such as a family member that did not have a condition."

fields.name: _notDone
fields.descr: "Extensions for notDone"

fields.name: notDoneReason
fields.descr: "Describes why the family member's history is absent."

fields.name: patient
fields.descr: "The person who this history concerns."

fields.name: date
fields.descr: "The date (and possibly time) when the family member history was taken."

fields.name: _date
fields.descr: "Extensions for date"

fields.name: name
fields.descr: "This will either be a name or a description; e.g. \"Aunt Susan\", \"my cousin with the red hair\"."

fields.name: _name
fields.descr: "Extensions for name"

fields.name: relationship
fields.descr: "The type of relationship this person has to the patient (father, mother, brother etc.)."

fields.name: gender
fields.descr: "Administrative Gender - the gender that the relative is considered to have for administration and record keeping purposes."

fields.name: _gender
fields.descr: "Extensions for gender"

fields.name: bornPeriod
fields.descr: "The actual or approximate date of birth of the relative."

fields.name: bornDate
fields.descr: "The actual or approximate date of birth of the relative."

fields.name: _bornDate
fields.descr: "Extensions for bornDate"

fields.name: bornString
fields.descr: "The actual or approximate date of birth of the relative."

fields.name: _bornString
fields.descr: "Extensions for bornString"

fields.name: ageAge
fields.descr: "The age of the relative at the time the family member history is recorded."

fields.name: ageRange
fields.descr: "The age of the relative at the time the family member history is recorded."

fields.name: ageString
fields.descr: "The age of the relative at the time the family member history is recorded."

fields.name: _ageString
fields.descr: "Extensions for ageString"

fields.name: estimatedAge
fields.descr: "If true, indicates that the age value specified is an estimated value."

fields.name: _estimatedAge
fields.descr: "Extensions for estimatedAge"

fields.name: deceasedBoolean
fields.descr: "Deceased flag or the actual or approximate age of the relative at the time of death for the family member history record."

fields.name: _deceasedBoolean
fields.descr: "Extensions for deceasedBoolean"

fields.name: deceasedAge
fields.descr: "Deceased flag or the actual or approximate age of the relative at the time of death for the family member history record."

fields.name: deceasedRange
fields.descr: "Deceased flag or the actual or approximate age of the relative at the time of death for the family member history record."

fields.name: deceasedDate
fields.descr: "Deceased flag or the actual or approximate age of the relative at the time of death for the family member history record."

fields.name: _deceasedDate
fields.descr: "Extensions for deceasedDate"

fields.name: deceasedString
fields.descr: "Deceased flag or the actual or approximate age of the relative at the time of death for the family member history record."

fields.name: _deceasedString
fields.descr: "Extensions for deceasedString"

fields.name: reasonCode
fields.descr: "Describes why the family member history occurred in coded or textual form."

fields.name: reasonReference
fields.descr: "Indicates a Condition, Observation, AllergyIntolerance, or QuestionnaireResponse that justifies this family member history event."

fields.name: note
fields.descr: "This property allows a non condition-specific note to the made about the related person. Ideally, the note would be in the condition property, but this is not always possible."

fields.name: condition
fields.descr: "The significant Conditions (or condition) that the family member had. This is a repeating section to allow a system to represent more than one condition per resource, though there is nothing stopping multiple resources - one per condition."

fields.name: text
fields.descr:
"A human-readable narrative that contains a summary of the resource, and may be used to represent the content of the resource to a human. The narrative need not encode all the structured data, but is required to contain sufficient detail to make it \"clinically safe\" for a human to just read the narrative. Resource definitions may define what content should be represented in the narrative to ensure clinical safety."

In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions."
